title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Information        Backcountry Permits  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Backcountry Permits  For the summer, effective Friday June 10, 2016, backcountry permits will be issued at Munising Falls Visitor Center. They will not be issued at the Interagency Visitor Center.          Chapel Road - Vehicle Size Limit  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Chapel Road - Vehicle Size Limit  This road and associated parking lot has been seeing heavy congestion. Large vehicles should avoid this road. Vehicles have been unable to maneuver around parked cars and have been stuck for hours.         Â      Grand Sable Dunes - undercut and eroding into Sable Creek and Lake Superior NPS photo/ Liz Drum  Grand Sable Dunes temporary closure to all public entry for visitor safety Grand Sable Dunes are rapidly eroding into Sable Creek and Lake Superior. The area from the Ghost Forest Trail north to Lake Superior then along the shoreline to the west side of Sable Creek is temporarily closed. Follow closure signs for your safety.   News Release - Grand Sable Dunes section closed due to hazardous erosion
